An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the utter demolishing, removing, and taking away of all monvments of superstition and idolatry out of all the churches England and Wales. Parliament.
8 p.
Printed for Edward Husbands, [London] : 1643.
Dated on p.3: Die Lunae, 28 Augusti, 1643. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
